description:
Kuwabara is set to square off against Shishi Wakamaru, but his source of power, Yukina, is nowhere to be found. Shishi’s secret weapon sends Kuwabara through a dimensional portal. What will he find on the other side?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atuul lui Shishiwakaramu, Promontoriul fărş întoarcere!
闇アイテム・死出の羽衣
